attributes.action: I want smear tests to be available during Covid & the vaccination process.
attributes.additional_details:
Make it a priority at the surgeries. I'm sick of seeing articles about how smears are at an all time low beacuse woman are anxious or afraid. They are at an all time low because no one will see us.
We are fighting to be seen and no one will.. We eventually get an appointment and it's cancelled. 

It's a simple solution. Keep theses screenings up!..
attributes.background: I want women to be able to book their smear tests without being turned away due to covid. For so long we was turned away because of the virus but now it's because vaccinations take priority. I was recently in hospital with cin3, I was only 5 month over my appointment. Woman need these screening!

rejection.details:
Decisions about the services provided during the Covid-19 outbreak are a matter for the NHS and individual NHS Trusts, not the Government or House of Commons.

If you are concerned about the services being provided by your local NHS trust you should contact them directly: https://www.nhs.uk/servicedirectories/pages/nhstrustlisting.aspx
